								            Treatment Options for Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia
								            
								                
								                    Chronic Phase Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia
								                    Treatment of chronic phase chronic myelogenous leukemia may include the following:         -  Targeted therapy with a tyrosine kinase inhibitor.    -  High-dose chemotherapy with donor stem cell transpl
